oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Greer, Terri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association
humane
animal welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Virtually everyone, especially members of the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) believe that animals should be treated humanely and with dignity. The PRCA values its animals and staunchly protects them with rules specifically designed to prevent cruelty or even unintentional mistreatment. Humane treatment of PRCA animals, both in and out of the arena, is a fact well-documented by veterinarians and research studies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 27-28
